<NEW - WHEELIE>

A=
nd then, throughout the clustering of Autobots there was the sound of appro=
aching fotosteps. Where once they had been tiny, now amongst the Autobots t=
he presence was average.

About the scale of the normal (by early generatio=
n Cybertronian standards) a Micromaster approached, his coloring a bright p=
each, his apparent alt mode some sort of miniaturized Cybertronian racer, a=
 red looking and somewhat faded Autobot emblem on his chest.

As he approac=
hed, he chimed in, "Where we're from, we have to go!  For when things start=
, who can know?"

At this point, according to popular folklore on his estab=
lished person, many of the Autobots would break and flee in screaming.

n smiling over at Kup as he chimed, "Hey there old guy!  You seem like you =
